Settings.encparamBox: -f mp4 -movflags faststart -c:v libx265 -preset veryfast -tune:v ssim -crf 23.0 -qmin 18 -qmax 30 -c:a copy -sn -timestamp now -libx265main10 -map_metadata -1 -map_chapters -1 -vsync cfr
